data.description:
Welcome to the wild, whimsical world of Nor-Tag, a unique social game where you're transformed into a mischievous monkey with only arms! In Nor-Tag, the jungle is your playground, and fun is always within reach.

Swing from tree to tree using just your arms, mastering the art of agile navigation. Challenge your friends in a series of hilarious mini-games designed to test your monkey skills. Whether it's a high-flying swinging race through the treetops or a frantic banana-throwing contest, Nor-Tag offers endless opportunities for laughter and friendly competition.

Collaboration is key in Nor-Tag. Work together with other arm-only monkes to solve puzzles and conquer challenges that require teamwork and quick thinking. Form alliances, strategize with your friends, and explore the vibrant, lush jungle environment filled with surprises at every turn.

Nor-Tag isn't just about competitionâ€”it's about community. Meet new friends, share your funniest moments, and celebrate your victories together. With customizable monkey avatars, you can express your unique style and personality, making every swing through the jungle a personal adventure.

So, get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey where your arms are your greatest assets. In Nor-Tag, the jungle is alive with excitement, camaraderie, and endless fun. Swing into action and discover the joy of being a monke with only arms!

changelog.change_log: The audio permissions (RECORD AUDIO) and (MODIFY AUDIO SETTINGS) are needed for voice chat.
